song_lyrics: He he he he... he he he he...
Ho ho ho... ho ho ho ho...
Sau sāthe maḷīne sau bhegā thaīne,
Bāḷ manḍaḷnā rūḍā kām karo...1 he he
Prabhu nām laīne, dhūn kīrtan karīne,
Bāḷ manḍaḷnā rūḍā kām karo... 2 he he
Khoṭu bolīe nahī, khoṭu karīe nahī,
Dīn dukhiyānī sevā karīe... 4 he he
Vyasan chorī ne īrṣhyā jevā avaguṇthī dūr rahīe,
He he he he... he he he he...
Ho ho ho... ho ho ho ho...
title: Kām karo bhāī kām karo

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1137: unknown

Category: Nrutya Gito
